Title: Merry-Go-Round
Director: Clement Sze-Kit Cheng, Yan Yan Mak
Writer: Clement Sze-Kit Cheng (screenplay), Yan Yan Mak (screenplay)
Actors: Teddy Robin Kwan, Nora Miao, Lawrence Chou, Ella Koon
Plot: Four protagonists, two generations and two continents are interwoven in Merry-Go-Round, a grand yet intimate narrative about leaving and returning. It starts in San Francisco, where Eva ...
